extendedInfo.description: DNL Reader Now available on Android !The DNL eBook Reader for Android is stylish yet simple and powerful eBook and ePub reader built to satisfy your mobile reading experience. DNL reader supports purchases made from a variety of web sites including DNLeBooks.com, eBookAuthors.com, eBook.biz, LoveeBooks.com and eBookMafia.com. These web sites and hundreds of others supported by the DNL eBook Reader feature eBooks from major publishers and authors around the world. Customers can purchase from those websites knowing that their purchases will be supported with their very own virtual vault that holds their eBooks in safe custody in case the Android or Windows device fail and they lose their eBooks.* Please note: The DNL reader for Android will read .DNL2 files which are specifically made for the DNL Android Reader. DNL (version 1) files are made for the Windows and MAC platform.DNL Reader features include- Simple and enjoyable navigation- Intelligent search- Custom bookshelf- Descriptive bookmarks- Redefined backdrop color- Night mode- Auto and manual font re size- Last Read page memory system- Purchase record, - eBook back up - Auto download and retrieval of eBooks- Page and chapter recognition- Multi Lingual- New eBook release notifications- Fully featured shopping cart with thousands of eBooks to choose from- and much much more

reviews.title: Works with dnl2
reviews.comment: One of the better readers out there. Good selection of books. It works pretty well with dnl2 files only, people should read the app description. For whatever reason, dnl does not seem to be supported yet. Could be named better Maybe google wont let them change.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DNL Reader ... Not!
reviews.comment: This doesn\'t work with the Skipper Bob cruising guide DNL files on my Bionic.  These files work fine with the windows reader software.  This app, like most apps I run across, might work but has no documentation to help the user.

reviews.title: Agree it\'s useless: won\'t even open book
reviews.comment: It won\'t even recognise dnl books in the correct local folder. It DOES recognise epubs - but then refuses to open them however tried! Pointless and frustrating. Uninstall......

reviews.comment: Downloaded a DNL file and needed a reader. This app can\'t \"see\" the file, so I can\'t open it. There are reasons why epub rules, and this is one...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great start
reviews.comment: I am fan of DNAML, these guys produced the DNL eBook system for Windows. Multimedia, authoring tools, distribution platform and security for your ebooks. I don\'t work for them but I use their tools and got to tell you this is just the beginning for the android. The buzz is that they are going to release the the tablet version 2nd week May. They just released the Authoring tool that converts the ePub into dnl for android, they announced in the blogs that the animation component is around the corner.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pathetic! Can\'t even \"Sign up\". Does not find books in their own catalogue! Keeps crashing. What a mess!
